thread.title_full: Susan T. Bigger is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a

author: Continental Who's Who
title: Susan T. Bigger is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a
text:
NEW ROCHELLE, N.Y. , Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Susan T. Bigger is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional in the field of Real Estate as a result of her role as a Licensed Real Estate Salesperson with Houlihan Lawrence . With connections and partnerships throughout the globe in 56 countries, Houlihan Lawrence is one of the largest real estate companies in the world. In business since 1888, Houlihan Lawrence provides top tier residential real estate to New York's Westchester , Dutchess and Putnam counties.
A Certified Buyer's Representative with sixteen years of experience in the industry, Susan's areas of expertise include buying and selling, buyer representation, first time home buyers, investment properties, listings, relocation, referrals and more. 
Recognized by the National Association of Professional Women as a VIP Woman of the Year, Susan is an esteemed member of the National Association of Realtors, NYSAR and the Hudson Gateway Association of Realtors. In her spare time, she enjoys spending time with family, gardening, reading and travel.
Charitably, Susan is heavily involved with her community and volunteers locally for the American Heart Association, American Cancer Society and American Diabetes Association. She is also on the Board of Trustees and Co-chair of the Stewardship Committee at the Larchmont Avenue Church.
Susan earned her Master of Business Administration from the Columbia University Graduate School of Business in addition to her undergraduate degree in Economics from the Columbia University School of General Studies .
For more information, please visit www.susanbigger.houlihanlawrence.com 
Contact: Robert Basilin , 516-825-5634 pr@continentalwhoswho.com
